_sText:
This map was created by Furchee.

Things included in the map :

"Disco" with "lightning" and two songs to choose from.
Football area.
1 Secret Room.
Shower Room.
Pool Room.
Cage.
Armory (contains M4A1, Ak47, Deagle, Scout, AWP, XM-1014, Hegrenades, Smokegrenades and Flashbangs.)
5 cells. (20 terrorist spawns and 20 ct spawns)
Fixed a bit of lighting.
Medic !

Update v2beta
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Redid cells. (Much more simple now.)
Added realistic lighting effects and removed some useless lights.
Fixed the outside clipping issues. (You can no longer climb above the rocks outside.)
Ladder to armory shortened and fence is cracked.
Redid the "burning" room underground.
Extended the pool area and changed the location of the pistol.
Added props to look more realistic. (Cars, Trucks, Oil Drums, Wire Coils, Cement Decks and so on.)
Changed positions of certain props.
All secrets changed including the infinite ammo dual elites.
Changed credits image and fixed up the credits room a bit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hope you guys like it !

~Furchee
